text: The Bank of Italy (Italian: Banca d'Italia, , informally referred to as Bankitalia) is the Italian member of the Eurosystem and has been the monetary authority for Italy from 1893 to 1998. Since 2014, it has also been Italy's national authority within European Banking Supervision. It is located in Palazzo Koch, via Nazionale, Rome. ==List of governors== ==References== Category:1893 establishments in Italy Category:Central banks Category:Banks of Europe Category:Companies based in Rome
title: Bank of Italy
